text: BVD and similar can mean: * Binnenlandse Veiligheidsdienst (General Intelligence and Security Service), the secret service of the Netherlands *Bovine viral diarrhea, a disease of cattle *Bureau van Dijk Electronic Publishing, a major publisher of business information *BVD, a brand of men's underwear * BVD, back vertex distance, the distance between the back surface of a corrective lens, i.e. glasses (spectacles) or contact lenses, and the front of the cornea.
title: BVD (disambiguation)
